content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/beetbox/beets.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image from Docker Hub
FROM python:3.9

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install Poetry for dependency management
RUN pip install poetry

# Install the necessary dependencies using Poetry
RUN poetry install

# Run the test suite to verify setup
RUN poetry run pytest
